name: 臺灣教育
goals: To understand the Taiwan education system
To think critically about issues and debates in contemporary education policy in Taiwan
To learn relevant theory and research that could be used to analyze educational issues and policy debates
To compare education issues in Taiwan with those in countries worldwide
